code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import chatSlice from'./chatSlice';import dataSlice from'./dataSlice';import uiSlice from'./uiSlice';export const store=configureStore({reducer:{chat:chatSlice,data:dataSlice,ui:uiSlice},middleware:getDefaultMiddleware=>getDefaultMiddleware({serializableCheck:{ignoredActions:['persist/PERSIST']}})});
